data.text:
@TheTorontoSun @anthonyfurey Someone is full of sh** 🤷‍♂️
@CTVNews @TheTorontoSun #cdnmedia #cdnpoli https://t.co/ckh4pC9PYO

@TheTorontoSun @BillArcher72 @anthonyfurey Everybody with a fucking neuron and any hint of critical thinking skills knew this from the start. It was obvious immediately this was not a 'pandemic' and that everything being done was not about a virus. Biggest psy-op, biggest criminal act in history. People must pay.
@TheTorontoSun @anthonyfurey Have to wonder, has Furey not heard of the Great Barrington Declaration, created and signed in October 2020?
@TheTorontoSun @anthonyfurey Gee imagine that. Also in the rest of Canada

@YarrenAlan @TheTorontoSun @anthonyfurey I see, so when the deaths from covid (acc. to government) were high, then the data from our government parroted by left-wing media were likely not a lie.  Now, when government says differently, you are saying it is most likely a lie.  🤦‍♀️

@TheTorontoSun @joe_warmington @anthonyfurey Well, I was nearly sure that deaths caused by Covid are lower then reported. Now, the thing is I am pretty curious about deaths and the serious side effects caused by the vax. Are they, by any chance higher then previously reported?
@TheTorontoSun @JPSteiny @anthonyfurey Can’t wait for the analysis that shows that the vax did way more damage than the actual virus. They can start with this.
